label: 杜荀鶴
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: Youngest son of Du Mu (803-852). He is credited with his own style of poetry, the Du Xunhe style, " in the Canglang shihua (ca. 1200). Private collection the Tangfeng ji."
